question: Which player in the list of IFFHS of FIFA Play of the Century has lower votes:  The winner of the most world cups or the player with a mustache and a beard?
context: Below is a list of players who have won multiple FIFA World Cups. Brazil's Pelé is the only player to have won three World Cup winners' medals, with 20 other players who have won two World Cup medals. Cafu is the only player who has appeared in 3 World Cup finals (winning 2 of them).
